data.claim: WCAG Color Contrast Requirements: Level AA - Normal text 4.5:1, Large text (18px+) 3:1, UI components 3:1. Level AAA - Normal text 7:1, Large text 4.5:1. Ratios cannot round up (4.47:1 fails 4.5:1). Never use color alone to convey info - pair with icons/text. Links by color need 3:1 contrast vs body text + visual cue on hover. 2026 deadline: ADA Title II mandates WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
